project.description: Denne jobben bygger en 0.0.2016.2-SNAPSHOT-versjon av bussen i kodestrømmen for 2016HL2, for bruk til automatisk, nattlig deploy. Kjøres hver dag kl 04.33

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: svn revert --recursive . svn up sed -ir 's@<version>[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*-SNAPSHOT</version>@<version>0.0.2016.2-SNAPSHOT</version>@' pom.xml sed -ir 's@<version>[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*-SNAPSHOT</version>@<version>0.0.2016.2-SNAPSHOT</version>@' ekstern-modules/pom.xml sed -ir 's@<version>[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*-SNAPSHOT</version>@<version>0.0.2016.2-SNAPSHOT</version>@' esb-modules/pom.xml sed -ir 's@<version>[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*-SNAPSHOT</version>@<version>0.0.2016.2-SNAPSHOT</version>@' nav-modules/pom.xml sed -ir 's@<version>[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*-SNAPSHOT</version>@<version>0.0.2016.2-SNAPSHOT</version>@' pensjon-modules/pom.xml sed -ir 's@<version>[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*-SNAPSHOT</version>@<version>0.0.2016.2-SNAPSHOT</version>@' pensjon-prosess-modules/pom.xml
